column1: Butyrate uptake was inhibited by several cysteine group modifying reagents such as p - chloromercuribenzosulphonic acid ( pCMBS), p - chloromercuribenzoate ( pCMB), mersalyl acid and HgCl2, but not by the stilbene anion exchange inhibitors, 4, 4 ' - diisothiocyanostilbene - 2, 2 ' - disulphonate ( DIDS) and 4, 4 ' - dinitrostilbene - 2, 2 ' - disulphonate ( SITS).
